response_text: Here are currently some of the best tools for Persian (Farsi) audio‑to‑text transcription, depending on what you need (quick online, app, high accuracy, or professional service): VMEG AI+4Notta+4Sonix+4 [https://www.notta.ai/en/transcribe-persian]  Top cloud/online AI transcription  Notta – fast online tool with good Persian support, exports text/subtitles, also mobile app. Notta [https://www.notta.ai/en/transcribe-persian]  Sonix – strong automated Persian transcription, easy editing/export, free minutes to start. Sonix [https://sonix.ai/convert-persian-m4a-files-to-text]  HappyScribe – AI transcription plus optional human‑checked transcripts for higher accuracy. HappyScribe [https://www.happyscribe.com/transcribe-persian]  ElevenLabs Scribe – AI Persian speech‑to‑text with very low error rates per benchmarks. ElevenLabs [https://elevenlabs.io/speech-to-text/persian]  VMEG AI – free/fast Persian transcription with timestamps and multi‑speaker support. VMEG AI [https://www.vmeg.ai/tools/audio-to-text/persian-transcription/]  Apps and simpler tools (mobile/web)  SpeechTexter – free web voice‑to‑text supporting Persian. Speech Texter [https://www.speechtexter.com/]  Persian Voice Typing (VoTyPer) – basic Android app for live voice‑to‑text. Google Play [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?hl=fa&id=com.PersianVoiceTyping.PersianSpeechToText]  Various native mobile apps (Gboard, Speechnotes) support Persian dictation. AvalAI [https://avalai.ir/blog/guide-to-using-speech-to-text-for-persian/]  Professional human‑assisted  GoTranscript – human‑edited Persian transcripts if you need accuracy beyond AI. GoTranscript [https://gotranscript.com/en/blog/top-5-persian-farsi-transcription-services-2026]  APIs/developer options  Soniox or Speechmatics – enterprise‑grade Persian speech‑to‑text APIs with strong accuracy and real‑time support. Soniox | Speech-to-Text AI+1 [https://soniox.com/speech-to-text/persian]  Quick guide  For fast and easy transcription: Notta, Sonix, VMEG.
